Prepare Yourself for Tomorrow. The DePaul University Honors Program is a vibrant community comprised of curious, passionate, and engaged students who all share one common goal: to learn, grow, and make a positive impact on the world around them. Through a liberal arts curriculum rich in critical analysis and opportunities to research today's most pressing issues, you will learn not only to be a leader in your field, but a leader in your community. Contact Us
